T02TD1252E:241b-1: shr'i he badzra ae ka bri tti b'i ra s'a dha nam /
T02TD1252E:241b-3: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1252E:241b-4: thugs rje chen po'i mnga' bdag 'phags ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1252E:241b-5: gang goms ro ni myangs tsam gyis //
T02TD1252E:241b-7: rab tu spong ba'i yon tan rnams //
T02TD1252E:241b-9: snga dro'i dus su mal nas langs te /
T02TD1252E:241b-10: snying gar ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bltas la //
T02TD1252E:241b-11: de'i 'od kyis bdag nyid dri ma med par byas la //
T02TD1252E:241b-12: aom raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1252E:241b-14: bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrungs la /
T02TD1252E:241b-15: bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02TD1252E:241b-16: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pas mandala der lag pa gzhag la /
T02TD1252E:241b-17: aom badzra me di ni badzri bha ba banbha h'u% zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD1252E:241b-18: aom a'a: h'u% zhes brjod de dbus su me tog gtor ro //
T02TD1252E:241b-19: shar du gam goo r'i na ma: zhes pas me tog gtor ro //
T02TD1252E:241b-20: lho ru tsam tsoo r'i na ma: / nub tu bam be tt'a li na ma: / byang du gham gha sma r'i na ma: / dbang ldan du pam pukka s'i n'a ma: / byin zar sham sha ba r'i n'a ma: / bden bral du lam tsanda l'i n'a ma: / rlung du dam dombi n'i n'a ma: / zhes bya ba de rnams kyis me tog gtor ro //
T02TD1252E:241b-21: de nas yang aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1252E:241b-22: zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das mchod la /
T02TD1252E:241b-24: au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam aa: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1252E:241b-25: zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod do //
T02TD1252E:241b-26: de nas rkang pa brgyad kyis kyang mchod de /
T02TD1252E:242a-0: aom aa sht'a na n'a ya na ma: / aom pim go rdh'a ke sha wa rtma ne na ma: / aom tsa tu rbim sha ti ne @242a * //
T02TD1252E:242a-2: aom sho da sha bhu dz'a ya na ma: / aom kri shna dz'i m'u ta wa pu she na ma: / aom ka p'a la m'a l'a ne /
T02TD1252E:242a-3: ka dha ri ne na ma: / aom aa dhma ta kr'u ra tsi tt'a ya na ma: aom aa rdhe ndu dam shtha ne na ma: / de nas yang /
T02TD1252E:242a-4: aom badzra pu shpe a'a h'u%/
T02TD1252E:242a-5: aom badzra dh'u shpe a'a: h'u% / aom badzra d'i pe a'a: h'u%/
T02TD1252E:242a-6: aom badzra ga ndhe a'a h'u%/
T02TD1252E:242a-7: aom badzra nee wi ti a'a: h'u%/
T02TD1252E:242a-8: zhes pas mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa yan lag bdun pa lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD1252E:242a-9: de nas phyag byas te gtor ma phul la /
T02TD1252E:242a-10: aom badzra mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1252E:242a-11: de nas byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa bzhi cung zad bsgoms nas /
T02TD1252E:242a-12: chos thams cad blos dmigs te /
T02TD1252E:242a-13: so sor brtags nas rang bzhin med cing /
T02TD1252E:242a-15: aom sh'u nya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1252E:242a-16: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD1252E:242a-17: de'i mthar ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD1252E:242a-18: aa dang h'u% gnyis bltas nas /
T02TD1252E:242a-19: de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mtha' gtugs pa na gnas pa'i sems can rnams byang chub la bkod de /
T02TD1252E:242a-20: de dag 'dres shing bkug nas sa bon gnyis la bstim ste /
T02TD1252E:242a-21: skad cig tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das su bsgom mo //
T02TD1252E:242a-22: zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa /
T02TD1252E:242a-23: zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi'i steng na phyed krung dang bcas pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya lnga'i mi mgo'i phreng ba can /
T02TD1252E:242a-24: bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i sku mdog khro ba dang bcas shing dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD1252E:242a-25: spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa /
T02TD1252E:242a-27: lag pa g-yas kyi thod pa brgyad na /
T02TD1252E:242a-36: g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na /
T02TD1252E:242a-45: spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin cing /
T02TD1252E:242b-0: gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'i lha mo @242b bdag med mas 'khyud pa bsgom mo //
T02TD1252E:242b-1: de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyi snying gar nyi ma la h'u% blta'o //
T02TD1252E:242b-2: bdag med ma'i snying gar zla ba la aam blta'o //
T02TD1252E:242b-4: mgrin par ni a'a: snying gar h'u% bkod la /
T02TD1252E:242b-5: mig la gti mug rdo rje ma /
T02TD1252E:242b-6: rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje ma /
T02TD1252E:242b-7: sna la ser sna rdo rje ma /
T02TD1252E:242b-8: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma /
T02TD1252E:242b-9: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma /
T02TD1252E:242b-10: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma rnams bkod la /
T02TD1252E:242b-11: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs te /
T02TD1252E:242b-12: aa bhi shi nytsa tu m'am sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02TD1252E:242b-13: zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pas /
T02TD1252E:242b-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyis me tog gi char phab ste bkug pa dang /
T02TD1252E:242b-15: lha mo brgyad kyis bstod pa dang //
T02TD1252E:242b-16: mchod pa byed par bsgom mo //
T02TD1252E:242b-17: bsgom pas dub na sngags bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD1252E:242b-18: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1252E:242b-19: ldang ba na rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la lha mo bsdus te /
T02TD1252E:242b-20: lha'i gzugs kyis rgyu bar bya'o //
T02TD1252E:242b-21: bsgom pa'i dus su thog ma dang tha mar gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1252E:242b-22: de la yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
T02TD1252E:242b-23: der aa las byung ba'i thod pa'i nang du /
T02TD1252E:242b-24: go ku da ha na dang /
T02TD1252E:242b-25: bi mu ma ra shu'i sa bon las byung ba'i rdzas rnams la /
T02TD1252E:242b-26: aom gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1252E:242b-27: de'i steng du h'u% las byung ba'i rdo rje bsgoms te /
T02TD1252E:242b-28: rdo rje dang padma sbyar ba'i me 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD1252E:242b-29: de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bltas la /
T02TD1252E:242b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon las bdud rtsi bkug ste /
T02TD1252E:242b-32: aom a'a: h'u% zhes pas byin gyis brlab pa 'di ni /
T02TD1252E:242b-33: gtor ma dang kha zas la sogs pa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1252E:242b-34: de nas skad cig tsam gyis//
T02TD1252E:242b-35: nam mkha' nas chos 'byung bar chud pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor bsam /
T02TD1252E:242b-36: dpa' bo gcig pu bltas la /
T02TD1252E:243a-0: 'dab ma rnams la ni phyogs skyong rnams mdog sngon po rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa so so'i btsun mos 'khyud @243a * //
T02TD1252E:243a-2: g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsgom mo //
T02TD1252E:243a-3: de ltar de'i steng du tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mdog dkar po rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can du bsam mo //
T02TD1252E:243a-4: 'og tu ni sa'i 'og tu rgyu ba'i 'gro ba rnams mdog dmar po snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can du bsgom mo //
T02TD1252E:243a-5: thams cad kyi lce la h'u% dkar po bsams te /
T02TD1252E:243a-6: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i goo r'i la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bdud rtsi phul bas tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1252E:243a-8: aom ainda dza ma dza la dza ksha bh'u ta ba hni ba au ra kkha tsanda sudzdza m'a da pa ppa ta l'a p'a ta la aa shta sappa sv'a h'a /
T02TD1252E:243a-9: ai dam ba lim bh'um dza dz'im gha phu lla dhu pa m'am sa pim gha aa mbha sappa kadzdza satva kha nti khu ni phe ta g'a da /
T02TD1252E:243a-10: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1252E:243a-11: zhes pa lan gsum brjod la zhal bsil dbul lo //
T02TD1252E:243a-12: sngags ni aom hr'i: bi shuddha na ya sarba bi ka lb'a na ya h'u% zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD1252E:243a-13: de nas yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod par bya ste /
T02TD1252E:243a-14: aom badzra mu: sa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1252E:243a-15: kha zas kyi dus su snga ma ltar sbyangs la bdag nyid kyi lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams la /
T02TD1252E:243a-16: snying gar bcom ldan 'das ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstims te /
T02TD1252E:243a-17: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyis me sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD1252E:243a-18: chags pa spyod pa'i dus su ni /
T02TD1252E:243a-19: shes rab ma bdag med mar bsgoms la /
T02TD1252E:243a-21: lkog mar ni a'a: snying gar h'u%/
T02TD1252E:243a-22: padma'i ge sar la aa bsgoms la /
T02TD1252E:243a-23: aom padma su kha dha ra ma h'a ra ga su kham da tda tsa tu r'a nanda bha ga bi shva h'u% h'u% h'u%/
T02TD1252E:243a-24: ka ryam ku ru shva me /
T02TD1252E:243a-25: zhes bya ba 'dis padma byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD1252E:243a-26: rdo rje h'u% gis bskyed nas /
T02TD1252E:243a-27: aom gyis nor bu byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD1252E:243a-28: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tu r'a nanda da ya ka kha ga mu kha ae ka ra so n'a tha h'u% h'u% h'u% ka ryam ku ru shva me zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD1252E:243a-30: ha ha ha zhes bya bas dga' ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD1252E:243a-31: bla ma'i man ngag gis de'i skad cig ma rnams mtshon par byas la /
T02TD1252E:243a-32: de'i bdud rtsi drangs nas bdag tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1252E:243b-0: chos thams cad @243b lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du bsams la nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD1252E:243b-1: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1252E:243b-2: slob dpon chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1252E:243b-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po dang /
T02TD1252E:243b-5: bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
